title: Team icaRdi
text:
This is our project webpage.
Please stay tuned to follow our project activities.
This is our template..

Team Members

[Mert Canlı]<(https://emu-hacettepe-analytics.github.io/emu430-fall2023-mertcanli01/)>
Bekir Gök
Alperen Gürkan
Elif Ece Uygun



Project Topic
The purpose of this project is to observe the relationship between performance metrics of teams and find the metrics that have a big impact on the rating of the teams.


Data Set
Our dataset's name is "Football teams | Rankings | Stats" taken from Kaggle This dataset contains rankings and statistics for football teams from 5 leagues. In the dataset there are 10 columns and 98 observations. The columns contain statistics that allow us to analyze a team's success and therefore rank them. 2 of our variables are characteristic, 5 of them are continuous and the rest of the variables are discrete

library(dplyr)
data_num <- select_if(data, is.numeric)
# correlation
corr <- cor(data_num)
# plot
corrplot(corr,tl.col = 'black')





boxplot(Rating~Tournament,data=data,col=c("red","pink","lightblue","yellow","purple"))
means <- tapply(data$Rating, data$Tournament, mean, na.rm = TRUE)
points(1:length(means), means, pch = 4)



  #points(1:4,tapply(data$Rating,data$Tournament,mean,na.rm=TRUE),pch=4)#
